sources.title: A Christmas Mystery | Full Movie | Mystery Drama | Esmé Bianco | Secret Past
sources.description:
A Christmas Mystery - When a reporter discovers that her late mother had been receiving Christmas cards from a secret admirer, she decides to track him down. In the process, she'll discover a family secret more dangerous than she could have ever imagined.
2014.  Stars: Esmé Bianco, Ryan Bittle, John Ratzenberger

metadata.Plot: When her best friend's dad is falsely accused of stealing the town's prized jingle bells, a young amateur sleuth and her friends must find the real thief before Christmas.
metadata.Actors: Violet McGraw, Santino Barnard, Lauren Lindsey Donzis
